captions.text: My head aches among the Neon Sign

Not only my heart but 
my bodies hurting too

I use more and more medicine 
The wound is twice bigger

I’m dizzy, 
my eyes are getting blurry
Again Lonely my feet is taking me somewhere
Lonely I can’t even control my body

There is everything I wanted to 
Die for there

Lonely it’s not 
somewhere I can’t come
Lonely Why am I so scared
Like the lights fluttering so is my mind
The voice is hovering(run run run)

I get sucked into it again 
(down down down)

I linger on the street wake up lady 
I lose my way out

I’m out of breath my feet 
hurts from high heels
My makeup is erased by my tears

Again lonely I’m walking 
without destination
Lonely wherever my body takes me

Everyone is laughing but why
Am I crying here

Lonely Nobody has changed 
Lonely Why am I suffering

Like the lights fluttering 
so is my mind
The voice is hovering(run run run)

I get sucked into it again 
(down down down)

I think I’m crazy only one 
drop of tears make me drunk
Because of you

Again Lonely my feet is 
taking me somewhere
Lonely I can’t even control my body

There is everything I wanted to 
Die for there
Lonely it’s not somewhere I can’t come
Lonely Why am I so scared
Like the lights fluttering so is my mind
